meanings.definition: A chemical compound found in the pits of apricots and other fruits, believed by some to have anti-cancer properties.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended eating apricot pits to get the benefits of laetriles.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe that laetriles can help fight cancer naturally.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that eating too many apricot pits for laetriles might turn you into an apricot tree!
meanings.sent4: Her love for apricots was so strong, it was like she had a heart made of laetriles.
meanings.sent5: The image of laetriles in the apricot pits stuck in my mind like a colorful puzzle piece.

meanings.definition: The use of laetriles as an alternative treatment for cancer.
meanings.sent1: Many people seek out laetriles as a natural way to combat cancer.
meanings.sent2: The clinic offers treatments that include the use of laetriles.
meanings.sent3: I heard a funny story about a cat that accidentally got a dose of laetriles and started purring in Morse code!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight cancer was like a warrior wielding a sword made of laetriles.
meanings.sent5: The idea of using laetriles as a secret weapon against cancer sparked hope in many hearts.
